originalText.text: I am a former professional dancer-turned-psychotherapist who went to Bill for a bad hip. I can’t recommend him highly enough. He approaches his work from an impressive depth of knowledge and helped me immediately. I’ve been attending to my body my entire life, and know this type of care very well. Bill is the cream of the crop.

text.text: I am a former professional dancer-turned-psychotherapist who went to Bill for a bad hip. I can’t recommend him highly enough. originalText.text:
Gotham City Acupuncture is the absolute BEST. I cannot recommend  them highly enough, not only to other dancers but to everyone who needs treatment. I have received acupuncture from various practitioners over the years, but Bill and Shane are undoubtedly the most thorough, caring and effective acupuncturists I have ever received treatment from. Naomi in the front office is exceptional, and I have never had an issue getting an appointment when emergency treatments are needed, even though their office is very busy.

I have received treatment multiple times throughout the pandemic and they have gone above and beyond with their safety protocols, wellness checks, PPE, and thorough cleaning. I felt incredibly safe being there.

Everyone at Gotham truly cares about their patients' well-being and they have been an absolute life-saver for me! I absolutely recommend them to anyone considering treatment.

originalText.text: I have been a patient at Gotham City Acupuncture for many years and they are the absolute best! As a professional dancer, I put my body through a lot. Bill and Shane do incredible work and have helped me stay healthy and avoid injury. I know I’m always in good hands and receiving the best care every time I step into their office. They are extremely knowledgeable and really do a wonderful job of listening to their clients and catering each appointment to their needs. In this time of Covid-19, they have gone above and beyond to ensure that everyone who enters their office feels comfortable and safe. The space is peaceful and clean, and they have gone to extraordinary lengths to ensure the health and safety of everyone who walks through the door. I highly recommend them!

originalText.text: Bill, Naomi & Shane are the best! They go out of their way to make sure their office is cleaned and sanitized (which is SO important during this pandemic). Their intake questions are extensive and thorough to ensure that they have a full understanding of your history and are best able to help in your healing. In just the first appointment, I had a fuller understanding of what was going on in my body and what we were going to do to treat it. Bill has a way of explaining things that not only makes sense, but shows his level of knowledge and care. Would HIGHLY recommend and send all my friends.

originalText.text: I have been a client of Gotham City Acupuncture for about two years now and can only rave about the treatment and care received. I give my highest compliments to Naomi at front of the house for her thorough command of COVID safety protocols and insistence on safety for patients and staff alike. I am very appreciative of their approach and the consideration given to maintaining a clean and healthy retreat. Then there is the professional care and excellent results I have gotten from acupuncture and related treatments from Bill and Shane. Worth every dime!  I only regret writing my highest reviews out of concern that it will get hard to book my next appointment!
